label: 藤原基俊
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1056-1142). Minamoto no Toshiyori's poetic adversary. Shunzei's teacher. Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩(15), Wakan kensakushū (1) as well as two pieces in the Honchō bunshū. Private waka collection Mototoshi shū. Comp. Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集. [源俊頼、俊成、漢詩、和漢兼作集、本朝文集、和歌、基俊集]
